stories: Once upon a time, a little girl was born to a poor family. Though they didn't have much, they loved her with all they had. The girl grew up happy and loved, and eventually married a man who made her happier than she ever could have thought possible. They had children who were also happy and loved, and life was just perfect.

Once upon a time there was a beautiful princess who lived in a shining castle. Though she was loved by many, the princess was lonesome. She longed for someone to share her life with. One day, a charming prince rode up to the castle on his white horse and asked for her hand in marriage. The princess was overjoyed and they lived happily ever after.

Once upon a time, a young girl was born with a very special talent. She had a beautiful voice that could make anyone feel happy and joyful. She used her voice to make people smile and feel loved, and everyone who heard her sing fell in love with her voice. Even though she was young, she used her voice to make a difference in the world and bring happiness to everyone she met.

The story of Cinderella is a classic story of a young woman who is mistreated by her stepmother and stepsisters, but is able to find happiness and love in the end. The story is not too cliche because it has a surprising ending.

There was once a young girl who was very unhappy. She felt like she had no purpose in life and she was always down. One day, she decided to go for a walk in the forest near her house. While she was walking, she came across a clearing in the forest and she saw a beautiful butterfly. The butterfly was so colorful and it was fluttering around so happily. The girl was so happy to see the butterfly and she felt like she had been given a new purpose in life. She decided that she wanted to be just like the butterfly and she started to smile and feel happy. She continued to walk in the forest and she found many more beautiful butterflies. She was so happy that she had found her new purpose in life.
Once upon a time, a young woman met a handsome prince and they fell in love. They got married and lived happily ever after. The end.
